UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Gallidermin: a new lanthionine-containing polypeptide antibiotic
Literature.Author: Kellner R, Jung G, Hörner T, Zähner H, Schnell N, Entian KD, Götz F

Literature.Title: The lantibiotic gallidermin acts bactericidal against Staphylococcus epidermidis and Staphylococcus aureus and antagonizes the bacteria-induced proinflammatory responses in dermal fibroblasts.
Literature.Author: Bengtsson T, Lönn J, Khalaf H, Palm E

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus SG511(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=4µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 6302(MIC=4µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 8668(MIC=1µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=64µg/ml),Corynebacterium xerosis ATCC 9755(MIC=1µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MIC=128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=128),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(MIC=0.25µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Bacteroides fragilis(MIC=128µg/ml),Peptostreptococcus anaerobius(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Cutibacterium acnes(MIC=0.125µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis RP62A(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CCUG 35601(MIC=1.56µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MBC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis RP62A(MBC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CCUG 35601(MBC=1.56µg/ml)
